A is uppercase.

item.title: Compiler error!idk what it means!i've tried everything!
item.dc:creator: @ProCoder94 ProCoder94
item.description:
@ProCoder94 wrote:

It means that you don’t have a method called animation.
Replace it with this:

[code]case 29063://axes
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1377 &&

specialAmount <= 99) {//dba
specialDamage = 0;
specialDamage2 = 0;
sendMessage("You do not have enough special energy

left.");
}
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1377 &&

specialAmount >= 100) {//dba
specialDamage = 0;
specialDamage2 = 0;
startAnimation(1670);
specialAmount -= 100;
}
specialAttacks();
specialAttacks2();
specialAttacks3();
specialAttacks4();
specialAttacks5();
specialAttacks6();
break;
case 33033://halberds
case 29113://bows
case 29163://swords
case 29138://dds
case 48023://whip
try {
if (usingSpecial == true) {
usingSpecial = false;
} else if (usingSpecial == false) {
usingSpecial = true;
}
specialAttacks();
specialAttacks2();
specialAttacks3();
specialAttacks4();
specialAttacks5();
specialAttacks6();
} catch (Exception popo) {
}
break;[/code]

It should work now.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler error!idk what it means!i've tried everything!
item.dc:creator: @redfrodude27 redfrodude27
item.description:
@redfrodude27 wrote:

Ok I am tring to make a Special Attack Bar and when i input this code…

[code]case 29063://axes
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1377 &&

specialAmount <= 99) {//dba
specialDamage = 0;
specialDamage2 = 0;
sendMessage("You do not have enough special energy

left.");
}
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1377 &&

specialAmount >= 100) {//dba
specialDamage = 0;
specialDamage2 = 0;
startAnimation(1670);
animation(246, absY, absX);
specialAmount -= 100;
}
specialAttacks();
specialAttacks2();
specialAttacks3();
specialAttacks4();
specialAttacks5();
specialAttacks6();
break;
case 33033://halberds
case 29113://bows
case 29163://swords
case 29138://dds
case 48023://whip
try {
if (usingSpecial == true) {
usingSpecial = false;
} else if (usingSpecial == false) {
usingSpecial = true;
}
specialAttacks();
specialAttacks2();
specialAttacks3();
specialAttacks4();
specialAttacks5();
specialAttacks6();
} catch (Exception popo) {
}
break;[/code]

It says to put it below the Switch so now it looks like…

[code] case 185: //clicking most

buttons
actionButtonId =

misc.HexToInt(inStream.buffer, 0, packetSize);

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“admin”))
println_debug("Case 185:

"+actionButtonId);

switch(actionButtonId) {
//These

values speak for themselves

//case 4126: windstrike break;

case 29063://axes
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1377 &&

specialAmount <= 99) {//dba
specialDamage = 0;
specialDamage2 = 0;
sendMessage("You do not have enough special energy

left.");
}
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1377 &&

specialAmount >= 100) {//dba
specialDamage = 0;
specialDamage2 = 0;
startAnimation(1670);
animation(246, absY, absX);
specialAmount -= 100;
}
specialAttacks();
specialAttacks2();
specialAttacks3();
specialAttacks4();
specialAttacks5();
specialAttacks6();
break;
case 33033://halberds
case 29113://bows
case 29163://swords
case 29138://dds
case 48023://whip
try {
if (usingSpecial == true) {
usingSpecial = false;
} else if (usingSpecial == false) {
usingSpecial = true;
}
specialAttacks();
specialAttacks2();
specialAttacks3();
specialAttacks4();
specialAttacks5();
specialAttacks6();
} catch (Exception popo) {
}
break;
[/code]
It has more but i dont think its important

And when i compile i get this error (im not done adding stuff to client.java so that might be it.)

client.java:20035: cannot find symbol symbol : method animation(int,int,int) location: class client animation(246, absY, absX); ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .
What does this mean and how can i fix this?

TY!!!

Read full topic
